name: Vegan Baked Ziti
description: Vegan Baked Ziti is an easy weeknight meal! This comforting pasta dish is made with cooked ziti noodles, marinara sauce, cashew cheese and optional vegan "meat". Gluten free & Nut free options.
recipeIngredient: 1 pound ziti noodles (gluten free if needed)
2 1/2 cups vegan ground "beef" OR 2-3 sliced vegan sausages, optional
1 bag non-dairy mozzarella cheese shreds, optional for topping

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch casserole dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Lightly grease a 9 x 13 inch casserole dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Cashew Cheese sauce: Soak the cashews in boiling hot water for at least 5 minutes. Drain the cashews and add them to a high powered blender along with the water, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, garlic, onion powder and salt. Blend until smooth, scraping the sides down as needed. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Cashew Cheese sauce: Soak the cashews in boiling hot water for at least 5 minutes. Drain the cashews and add them to a high powered blender along with the water, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, garlic, onion powder and salt. Blend until smooth, scraping the sides down as needed. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare pasta according to package instructions. You can cook the pasta while your cashews are soaking to save time. Drain the noodles and add to casserole dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare pasta according to package instructions. You can cook the pasta while your cashews are soaking to save time. Drain the noodles and add to casserole dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the marinara sauce and "meat", if using, on top of the noodles and stir to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the marinara sauce and "meat", if using, on top of the noodles and stir to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the cashew cheese on top of noodle/sauce mixture and stir gently, leaving pockets of cheese intact.
recipeInstructions.name: Spoon the cashew cheese on top of noodle/sauce mixture and stir gently, leaving pockets of cheese intact.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with non-dairy mozzarella cheese shreds OR about 1/2 cup of Vegan Parmesan.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with non-dairy mozzarella cheese shreds OR about 1/2 cup of Vegan Parmesan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes until hot throughout.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes until hot throughout.
